data.comment: Coventry kick-off to get the first-half underway.
Norwich have been given a penalty at Carrow Road...
In the minute 27, Goal! Norwich take a 1-0 lead thanks to a Mario Vrancic spot-kick..
The whistle has gone to end the first-half.
Norwich have kicked-off the second half at Carrow Road.
In the minute 55, Jakob Lungi Sorensen (Norwich) gets a yellow card.
Jordan Shipley is on a sub for Ben Sheaf for Coventry.
Mark Robins (Coventry) is making a second substitution, with Tyler Walker replacing Amadou Bakayoko.
In the minute 61, The away team have replaced Jamie Allen with Gustavo Hamer. This is the third substitution made today by Mark Robins.
The away team replace Fankaty Dabo with Wesley Jobello.
Mark Robins is making the team's fifth substitution at Carrow Road with Maxime Biamou replacing Liam Kelly.
In the minute 85, Norwich make their first substitution with Christoph Zimmermann replacing Josh Martin.
Maxime Biamou levels the score at 1-1.
That's full-time at Carrow Road. The final score is 1-1.
Reece McAlear is replacing Max Aarons for Norwich at Carrow Road.
